link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://xbrl.org/2010/filter/aspect-cover http://www.xbrl.org/2010/aspect-cover-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/entity http://www.xbrl.org/2008/entity-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2005/xbrldt http://www.xbrl.org/2005/xbrldt-2005.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/instance http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-instance-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/XLink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xl-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xlink-2003-12-31.xsd

gen:link.msg:message: Company's financial year start date is MUST be reported.
Tarikh mula tahun kewangan syarikat MESTI dilaporkan.
Type of reasons for extension of time to lodge financial statements and reports MUST be reported
Jenis sebab pelanjutan masa untuk serah simpan penyata kewangan dan laporan MESTI dilaporkan

When filer selects option as "Others" from "Type of reasons for extension of time to lodge financial statements and reports" THEN "Description of reason why apply for extension of time to lodge financial statements and reports" MUST be reported

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA5B" and $V1 eq "Others")or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA5B" and $V1 eq "Others")
($V3 eq "EA5B" and $V1 eq "Others")or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA5B" and $V1 eq "Others")

gen:link.msg:message: Apabila pemfail memilih pilihan "Others" daripada "Jenis sebab pelanjutan masa untuk serah simpan penyata kewangan dan laporan" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sebab memohon pelanjutan masa untuk serah simpan penyata kewangan dan laporan." MESTI dilaporkan

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA5B" and $V1 eq "Others")or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA5B" and $V1 eq "Others")

gen:link.msg:message: Company's financial year end date is MUST be reported
Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan Syarikat MESTI dilaporkan
Proposed date for the extension of time to lodge financial statements and reports MUST be reported
Cadangan tarikh penyata kewangan dan laporan akan diserah simpan MESTI dilaporkan
Date of submission should be within 6 months from "Company's financial year end date"
Tarikh serahan hendaklah dalam tempoh 6 bulan dari "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan syarikat"
Company's financial year end date must be greater than Company's financial year start date
Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan Syarikat mestilah lebih besar daripada tarikh mula tahun kewangan Syarikat
If filer selects origin of company "Incorporated in Malaysia" and status of company as "Private company" THEN "Circulation date of financial statements" MUST be reported
Jika pemfail memilih asal syarikat "Incorporated in Malaysia" dan status syarikat "Private company" KEMUDIAN "Tarikh edaran penyata kewangan" MESTI dilaporkan
If filer selects origin of company "Incorporated in Malaysia" and status of company as "Public company" THEN "Circulation date of financial statements" SHOULD NOT be reported
Jika pemfail memilih asal syarikat "Incorporated in Malaysia" dan status syarikat "Public company" KEMUDIAN "Tarikh edaran penyata kewangan" TIDAK SEHARUSNYA dilaporkan

If filer selects origin of company "Incorporated outside Malaysia" and status of company as "Private company" or "Public company" THEN "Circulation date of financial statements" SHOULD NOT be reported
Jika pemfail memilih asal syarikat "Incorporated outside Malaysia" dan status syarikat "Private company" atau "Public company" KEMUDIAN "Tarikh edaran penyata kewangan" TIDAK SEHARUSNYA dilaporkan
If filer selects origin of company "Incorporated in Malaysia" and status of company as "Public company" THEN "Date of annual general meeting" MUST be reported.
Jika pemfail memilih asal syarikat "Incorporated in Malaysia" dan status syarikat "Public company" KEMUDIAN "Tarikh mesyuarat agung tahunan" MESTI dilaporkan.
If filer selects origin of company "Incorporated outside Malaysia" and status of company as "Private company" or "Public company" THEN "Date of annual general meeting" IS NOT MANDATORY be reported
Jika pemfail memilih asal syarikat "Incorporated outside Malaysia" dan status syarikat "Private company" atau "Public company" KEMUDIAN "Tarikh mesyuarat agung tahunan" TIDAK WAJIB dilaporkan
If filer selects origin of company "Incorporated in Malaysia" and status of company as "Private company" THEN "Date of annual general meeting" SHOULD NOT be reported.
Jika pemfail memilih asal syarikat "Incorporated in Malaysia" dan status syarikat "Private company" KEMUDIAN "Tarikh mesyuarat agung tahunan" TIDAK SEHARUSNYA dilaporkan.
